description:
## Japplis Clipboard History Pro - Show Text Clipboard History

![Screenshot of Japplis Clipboard History Pro](https://www.japplis.com/clipboard-history/pro/images/clipboard-history-pro-screenshot.png)

Clipboard History Pro remembers the text copied in the clipboard from other applications. 
        You can see the list of previous copied text and put them back in the clipboard.
        The list is editable, so you can add new text, delete, move or edit previously copied text.
        It is possible to pause monitoring the clipboard. It is possible to specify a white list or blacklist for text to be acquired in the list based on regular expressions.
        It can also run always on top, translucent or inside an IDE such as IntelliJ IDEA, Android Studio, Eclipse or NetBeans.
author: Japplis
